channel.title: Nulls
channel.description:
Hi, im running a server and when it starts, it works great but after a while (10 min) i start getting "client null disconnected" messages in the log and also just "null" messages on every line, every second. anyone know how to fix this. thnks
first i get these kinds of messages: [code]Connection from **.*.***.236:36032 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (**.*.***.236)[/code] then after a while it turns to these:
[code]null null null null[/code]

item.title: Nulls
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

im not the maker of this source, i dont know anything about this source. im just hosting it. but this null thing is crashing the server so how do i get rid of it

Read full topic

item.title: Nulls
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

It’s called an anti-leech. Delta made it in his source because he didn’t want people to have it that don’t know how to code. Therefor, putting this in there would be a test to see if you’re a real coder or not. If you can’t get rid of it yourself, you don’t deserve the source is pretty much the theory.

Read full topic
